title: DDFP 606: Week 6 Red Challenge Picks & Re-ranking Big Ben Among Top QBs
itunes:title: DDFP 606: Week 6 Red Challenge Picks & Re-ranking Big Ben Among Top QBs
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Handsome Hank, Matt “Money” Smith and Cynthia Frelund to break down the current state of the AFC West, discussing how concerned they are about the Raiders and Money’s perspective on the Chargers’ first victory (8:12). Then, for Hank’s topic of choice, the fellas and Cynthia give Dave a chance to change his Steelers record prediction and re-rank Big Ben among the league’s top QBs (26:09). Lastly, EmmaVP reads her Week 6 "TV Guide" drama edition previews for the biggest matchups of the week for the guys to preview and make their Red Challenge Flag picks (43:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
